statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={188.3}{e}^{{{0.0387}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0387}}\approx{1.0394585992901}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0394585992901}-{1}={0.039458599290056}\approx{0.0395} and the percent is 3.95.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
